author: lzybkr
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves issue #xyz.
- [ ] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

Initial implementation of SemanticVersion, and use this new type for $PSVersionTable.PSVersion

Resolves #1369 and #1450

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: AFAIK the test failures are only in the flaky network tests #1499.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I have several of the alpha.7 packages made... but I kind of want this in first because of the PSVersion update.

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
> `<!-- PR checklist -->`
> `[ ] Resolves issue #xyz.`

You put

> Resolves #1369 and #1450

and ignored the PR template.
is it unclear what's the PR template for? How we can improve it?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: I ignored the template because the (GitHub) UI sucks.  It looks like a comment, it says checklist (not template), I gave it zero thought and just left it alone assuming I don't touch the checklist.

title: Semver
